item.name: sites
item.param:
sites\[\d+\]\.\w+, sites\[\d+\]\.merchant\.industryType\.desc, sites\[\d+\]\.merchant\.name, sites\[\d+\]\.merchant\.id, sites\[\d+\]\.template\.name, sites\[\d+\]\.status\.desc, sites\[\d+\]\.status\.value,
pagination\.begin, pagination\.pageSize, pagination\.count, pagination\.currentPage

item.name: site
item.param: \w+, merchant\.name, merchant\.id, theme\.desc, theme\.value, template\.name, template\.id, status\.desc, status\.value
